thread.title: Played the Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 beta on PS4? Get a free theme - Gaming
thread.title_full: Played the Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 beta on PS4? Get a free theme - Gaming News - Digital Spy

author: Albaraa Fahmy
title: Played the Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 beta on PS4? Get a free theme - Gaming
text: If you played the Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 beta on PlayStation 4, you are eligible to receive a free dynamic theme.The theme on offer is of Morg City, which serves as the backdrop for the upcoming shooter's new Zombies mode Shadows of Evil.To get the theme, head over to the PlayStation Store, search for Black Ops 3, select the game, scroll down to the 'Morg City Zombies Theme' and then download it.The Black Ops 3 beta was playable on PS4, Xbox One and PC. It launched with three multiplayer maps, eight of the new Specialist classes and seven modes.It also allowed participants to create five custom load-outs and choose from five pre-set ones, named Vanguard, Breach, Sentinel, Overwatch and Sharpshooter. Â© Activision Black Ops 3 will be available on PS4, Xbox One, PS3, Xbox 360 and PC from November 6.Treyarch recently apologised for a bizarre campaign for the game that caused an uproar late last month.Call of Duty: Black Ops 3: Everything we know so far including the beta, trailers and ZombiesCheck out our most anticipated games of October, one of many videos in Digital Spy's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel. Be sure to subscribe!
